title: Online Engineering Mathematics Education Design Based on Collaborative Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math and engineering concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate practical application skills of engineering mathematics through collaborative problem-solving for current industry practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and solve real-world engineering problems using mathematical modeling techniques.
Learners can solve mathematical problems while communicating in real-time with peers using online collaboration tools.
Learners can improve their mathematical problem-solving strategies based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
